summary: The Sheik is a pop culture documentary that chronicles Khosrow Vaziri's electrifying career. From his upbringing in Iran, to his journey in America, to his unprecedented experiences as America's most hated villain.
cast: Khosrow Vaziri|Jack Black|Jim Duggan|Mick Foley|Todd W. Fulkerson|David Golshan|Seth Green|Keith Elliot Greenberg|Bret Hart|Jimmy Hart|Hulk Hogan|Dwayne Johnson|Jian Magen|Page Magen|Greg Oliver|Bob Orton Sr.|Christopher Alan Pallies|Josip Peruzovic|Bruce Prichard|Jake Roberts|Jim Ross|Jerry Saganowich|Ron Simmons|Mohamad Tavakoli|Caryl Vaziri|Nicole Vaziri|Tanya Vaziri|James Ware|Larry Whistler|Brian Yandrisovitz
keywords: wrestling|reference to youtube|reference to twitter|reference to facebook|new york city
title: The Sheik
